Remote Control Your TV Devices Cast content from phone to your TV. MY REMOTE ADD NOW TV Remote Control by Mobile START CAST Screen Choose the type of your TV remote IR TV Remote Smart TV Remote I do not know Control TV via IR Control TV via Wi-Fi> Your phone needs to have a 
 built-in IR (infrared blaster). Your TV and phone need to be 
 on the same WiFi network. START NOW Select TV Brand We've found %d remote 
 controls for your Acer TV. Please test them one by one to find the remote that matches your TV model. START TESTING Tap the buttons below to test if the TV responds correctly Test Acer remote Does your TV respond? Xiaomi TV connected! Save the remote The remote is now connected to your TV.
 Please save it for future use. Name your remote Default Living room Bedroom Dinning room Media room TV location Icon Color SAVE TV style preview Settings Feedback Rate us Share Language Options Privacy Policy Report bugs and tell us what to improve Like this app? Please rate us! Share TV Remote Control with your friends Tell us the problem 
 you encountered What's your TV brand* Please select your TV brand What's your problem* Select the problem Please select your problem More details Please tell us more details so that we can locate and solve your problem faster SUBMIT Your phone needs to have built-in IR (infrared blaster). Your TV and phone need to be on the same WiFi network. TV brands There is no built-in infrared blaster in your phone,so you can't control TV via IR TRY WIFI REMOTE %s TV connected The name change has already been used We are working hard for a better user experience. We'd greatly appreciate if you can rate us. The best we can get :) RATE Photo Video Audio Image
online Screen Mirroring Completely duplicate the content displayed on the phone screen. Select device Please make sure: 1. Turn on TV.
2. Connect to same Wi-Fi on your phone and TV.
3. Turn off the VPN on your phone if it's connected. Searching device To display the Wi-Fi name, please allow Location access in Settings. Current Wi-Fi:
